body:
Sorry for having this come out from absolutely nowhere, had to get it out of me, though. Anyway, here's my list of the things that I believe match the title.

Characters:

  • Majora (Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask)
  • 5-Volt (Game & Wario)
  • Shelly de Killer (Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney: Justice for All)
Places:

  • Lavender Town (Pokémon Red, Blue, & Yellow)
  • Old Chateau (Pokémon Diamond, Pearl, & Platinum)
  • Luigi's Mansion ("")
These are just to name a few, you fill in the blanks.

title: Creepiest VG Characters/Places

replies.body:
Characters: Mal'Ganis, Balnazzar, Tichondrius, Varimathras and Detheroc. Warcraft Dreadlords in general. 

Places: Outland, Northrend and the Darkpalace.
